name: Shuntle
summary:
You get 6 tries to guess the secret word. The secret word is between 4 and 7 letters and you can guess words between 4 and 7 letters. Shorter secret words may have trailing spaces or leading spaces. Spaces might be at the beginning, the end, or both.

Letters in your guess are: green if you guessed a letter in the right place; yellow if the letter is somewhere else in the word; or grey if the letter is not in the word.
